definition: the world in chaos/troubled times/(in Buddhism) the mortal world
in confusion or disorder/in a confused state of mind/disorder/upheaval/riot/illicit sexual relations/to throw into disorder/to mix up/indiscriminate/random/arbitrary
surname Shi
life/age/generation/era/world/lifetime/epoch/descendant/noble
Gone with the Wind (film)

sentences.english: But, history prove less pardons in brilliant times, more pardons in troubled times.
sentences.chinese: 盛世时赦少，乱世赦多也是历史所证明的。

sentences.english: Chaotic Nodes are clusters of chaotic events.
sentences.chinese: “乱世高潮点”是一系列的混乱事件。

sentences.english: Should you stick with stock funds in this tumultuous environment?
sentences.chinese: 在如此乱世，还该持有股票型基金吗？

sentences.english: This has made her to start the road of pursuing her self-value in the time of misfortune.
sentences.chinese: 让她在乱世中走上了寻求自我价值的道路。

sentences.english: Zhang Ailing is that one was born in the strange woman in troubled times.
sentences.chinese: 张爱玲就是一个生于乱世的奇女子。

sentences.english: Pan troubled times longer than the book.
Yet both are perceived as havens of safety in a troubled world.
sentences.chinese: 不过，两者都被视为当前乱世中的安全港。

sentences.english: I’m in a business where there’s complete anarchy.
sentences.chinese: 我的这个行业如今是彻底的乱世。

sentences.english: The Chaotic Nodes are upon you in ever-increasing intensity.
sentences.chinese: 乱世高潮点以不断增长的强度在接近你们。

definition: peace and prosperity (idiom)
the whole country in rebellion
lit. fire beacons in all four directions (idiom); the confusion of war
chaos of war
the ways of the world/the morals of the time
chaotic situation
soldiers munity and troops rebel (idiom); turmoil and chaos of war
to transition to a new dynasty or regime
fire of war everywhere (idiom); enveloped in the flames of war
at dawn, not sure of lasting to evening (idiom); precarious state/imminent crisis/living from hand to mouth
rites and music are in ruins (idiom); fig. society in total disarray/cf. 禮樂|礼乐[li3 yue4]
a flourishing period/period of prosperity/a golden age
see 禮崩樂壞|礼崩乐坏[li3 beng1 yue4 huai4]
person who seeks advancement by any means/career climber/unscrupulous careerist
great heroes pursue deer in the central plains (idiom); fig. many vie for supremacy
current situation/circumstances/current trend
